incidents.title: O Fire Brigade Operation
incidents.description: Due to a fire brigade operation in the Bruno-Marek-Allee area, line O is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Quellenplatz. The disruption is expected to last until 00:10.

incidents.title: O Fire Brigade Operation
incidents.description: Due to a fire brigade operation in the Ungargasse 42 area, line O is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Bruno-Marek-Allee. The disruption is expected to last until 23:50.

incidents.title: 12A Emergency Response
incidents.description: Due to an emergency response in the Mariahilfer Straße # Geibelgasse area, line 12A is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Schmelz, Gablenzgasse. The disruption is expected to last until 23:40.

incidents.title: 60 Fire Brigade Operation
incidents.description: Due to a fire brigade operation in the Preyergasse area, line 60 is currently only operating between Westbahnhof S U and Hietzing U or Hofwiesengasse and Rodaun. Please use lines 56A and 56B as alternatives. The end of the disruption is currently unforeseeable.

incidents.title: 2 Traffic Accident
incidents.description: Due to a traffic accident in the Marienbrücke stop area, line 2 is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Dornbach. The disruption is expected to last until 13:20.

incidents.title: 2 Emergency Response
incidents.description: Due to an emergency response in the Römergasse stop area, line 2 is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Friedrich-Engels-Platz. The disruption is expected to last until 06:40.

incidents.title: 5 Wrongly Parked Vehicle
incidents.description: Due to a wrongly parked vehicle in the Blindengasse 13 area, line 5 is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Praterstern S U. The disruption is expected to last until 06:20.

incidents.title: 98A: Delays
incidents.description: The bus line 98A can currently only operate irregularly in both directions.

incidents.title: 49: Fire Brigade Operation
incidents.description: Due to a fire brigade operation in the Hütteldorfer Straße # Ameisbachzeile area, line 49 is only operating between Ring, Volkstheater U and Breitensee S. The end of the disruption is currently unforeseeable.

incidents.title: N49 Fire Brigade Operation
incidents.description: Due to a fire brigade operation in the Hütteldorfer Straße # Ameisbachzeile area, line N49 is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Hütteldorfer Straße U. The end of the disruption is currently unforeseeable.

incidents.title: U2z Emergency Response
incidents.description: Due to an emergency response at Dr.-Karl-Renner-Ring, lines 1 and D towards Marsanogasse, line 2 towards Dornbach, and line U2Z towards Schottenring are obstructed from continuing. The disruption is expected to last until 01:00.
